casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gary LAWRENCE. No. 457PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2005. Thomas C. Maher, Chapel Hill, for Lawrence. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the second motion filed on the 31st day of May 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 6th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of June 2005."
